page.title: 17SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
page.content: { BRITISH TELECOM OFFICE. This opened in 1983.It is the county's only private office and England's 3rd largest,serving parts of Bucks and Oxon. There are 72 telephones,and 4450 emergency calls have been received. {BUCKINGHAM SEWAGE TREATMENT WORKS The Buckingham Sewage Treatment Works supplies Buckingham,Gawcott & Maids Moreton all the flow is pumped or { gravitates to the pumping station at Linden Village,Main Lift. { { FOSCOTE RESERVOIR. Built in 1955,this supplies parts of Bucks and S.Northants.Water is taken from the R.Gt.Ouse.Treatment Works, built in 1953,can take 2 million gallons a day at no.2 Station.The clay dam is 30ft.high and 900ft.long. The reservoir holds 105 million gallons when full to 339ft.above sea level. Area is 46 acres (land area 83 acres).
